title: Time Echoes
provenance_text:
Samuel Rosenberg [1896-1972], Pittsburgh, PA; purchased by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1952 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The painting was no. 233 in "The 1952 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Paintings" held at Carnegie Institute, October-December 1952. 
[2]. The museum purchased the painting from the International, in part by exchange of the artist's painting "Israel," which had formerly been in the museum's collection (see copies of correspondence with the artist in curatorial file.)
